title: get_all_rfps_with_pagination_and_filtering
description: Verify that the API endpoint /api/rfps correctly returns a paginated list of RFPs filtered by status and portalId query parameters, with default pagination values applied when not specified.

title: create_new_rfp
description: Test the POST /api/rfps endpoint to ensure a new RFP can be created successfully with valid input data and returns a 201 status code.

title: get_specific_rfp_by_id
description: Validate that the GET /api/rfps/{id} endpoint returns the correct RFP details for a valid ID and returns 404 for a non-existent RFP ID.

title: get_documents_for_specific_rfp
description: Check that the GET /api/rfps/{id}/documents endpoint returns the list of documents associated with the specified RFP ID.

title: get_detailed_rfps_with_compliance_data
description: Ensure the GET /api/rfps/detailed endpoint returns detailed RFP information including compliance data accurately.

title: enhanced_ai_powered_proposal_generation
description: Test the POST /api/proposals/enhanced/generate endpoint to verify that enhanced AI-powered proposal generation starts correctly with required parameters and returns a session ID.

title: pipeline_based_proposal_generation
description: Validate that the POST /api/proposals/pipeline/generate endpoint initiates the pipeline-based proposal generation process and returns a success response.

title: get_all_portals_with_rfp_counts
description: Verify that the GET /api/portals endpoint returns a list of government procurement portals along with their associated RFP counts and statistics.

title: start_rfp_discovery_workflow
description: Test the POST /api/discovery endpoint to ensure that the RFP discovery workflow can be started successfully and returns a 201 status code.

title: health_check_endpoint_returns_system_healthy
description: Verify that the GET /api/health endpoint returns a 200 status code with a message indicating the system is healthy under normal operating conditions.
